Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Alaris.Core.AlarisBotThe main class for Alaris
Alaris.LuaPlugin.AlarisPlugin
Alaris.MainPlugin.AlarisPlugin
Alaris.MangosRssPlugin.AlarisPlugin
Alaris.Irc.ChannelModeInfoA simple struct designed to hold al the attributes that are contain in a Channel mode
Alaris.Irc.CommandBuilderCommandBuilder provides the support methods needed by its subclasses to build correctly formatted messages for the IRC server. It is never itself instantiated
Alaris.Extras.ConfigFileInvalidExceptionException thrown when an invalid config file is detected
Alaris.Irc.ConnectionThis class manages the connection to the IRC server and provides access to all the objects needed to send and receive messages
Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgsA collection of parameters necessary to establish an IRC connection
Alaris.Extras.CrashHandlerA class providing functions to run specific method in an exception-handled environment
Alaris.Irc.CtcpListenerThis class is used to send CTCP specific events. Once registered with this object the client can receive notification of all CTCP requests, pings, and replies. Instances of this class are not created directly but are retrieved as a property from a Connection object
Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponderA class which automatically responds to CTCP queries. The replies it sends are configurable by the client
Alaris.Irc.CtcpSenderThis class allows the client to send CTCP commands. There is no limit on what commands can actually be sent, however, the accepted CTCP commands are: UserInfo, Finger, Version, Source, ClientInfo, ErrMsg, and Time
Alaris.Irc.CtcpUtilConstants and utility methods to support CTCP
Alaris.Irc.DccChatSessionEstablish a DCC Chat connection with a remote user
Alaris.Irc.DccFileInfoManages the information about the file being transfered
Alaris.Irc.DccFileSessionAllows the user to send and receive files from other IRC users
Alaris.Irc.DccFileSessionManagerThis class checks each file session to see if it has not had any activity within the timeout period so that inactive sessions can be closed
Alaris.Irc.DccListenerDccListener listens for incoming DCC requests on any Connection in which DCC is enabled. This class follows the singleton pattern and there so there is only a single instance which listens to all connections
Alaris.Irc.DccUserInfoThis class encapsulates all the information known about a remote user in the context of a DCC session
Alaris.Irc.DccUtilUtility methods needed to handle DCC requests
Alaris.Core.Entry
Alaris.Extras.HaskellEvaluatorA class which provides methods to compile and run arbitrary Haskell code
Alaris.Core.IAlarisBasic
Alaris.Irc.IdentdAn Ident daemon is still used by some IRC networks for authentication. It is a simple service which when queried by a remote system returns a username. The server is controlled via static methods all of which are Thread safe
Alaris.Irc.IParserClasses should implement this Interface in order to act as custom parsers for the raw messages received from IRC servers
Alaris.Extras.IrcConstantsClass holding some constant values for IRC
Alaris.Irc.ListenerThis class parses messages received from the IRC server and raises the appropriate event
Alaris.Core.LogLogging class used all across Alaris
Alaris.Extras.MangosRssClass providing methods for working with MaNGOS rss feeds
Alaris.Irc.NameGeneratorGenerates random, made-up names. The names appear to be language neutral (sort of)
Alaris.Irc.Rfc2812UtilRFC 2812 Utility methods
Alaris.Extras.ScriptManagerA script manager for the IRC connections. Loads plugins, manages events etc
Alaris.Irc.SenderThis class is used to send all the IRC commands except for CTCP and DCC messages. Instances of this class are retrieved as properties of the Connection object. All methods in this class are thread safe
Alaris.Irc.ServerPropertiesEncapsulates the collection of properties sent by the IRC server after registration
Alaris.Irc.TextColorThis class conatins a set of methods for adding and removing mIRC color and other control codes
Alaris.Irc.UserInfoA convenient holder of user information. Instances of this class are created internally
Alaris.Extras.UtilitiesClass providing useful methods for handling different things
Alaris.Extras.WebHelperA class which provides useful methods for working with the world-wide web
Alaris.Irc.WhoisInfoThe collection of information about a user returned by a Whois query. Instances of this class are created internally
